eng: hurry and you will be late
a man bitten by a snake is afraid of rope
be a lion and eat me
he knocks and says who is there
little drops make the mighty ocean
lock so that you can find what to unlock
the eyes see but the hands cannot reach
a friend in need is a friend indeed

darija: Li darha b yeddih yfekha b sennih
eng: Whoever caused the problem is responsible of fixing it
